nodes.text: The Fitca system was a star system located in Urce Space, a Mid Rim sector contained within the Lesser Plooriod Cluster. It contained the planet Fitca Prime.
The Fitca system was situated on a hyperlane that ran through Urce Space.
Fitca Prime was the primary world in the Fitca system.
During the early years of the Galactic Civil War, Fitca Prime and its system were subjugated by the Galactic Empire.
By 12 ABY, the Fitca system was located within the borders of the New Republic.
